dl.dd: Located on Route 3, it is 3 km (2 mi.) east of the villlage of Chester and about 5 km west of Exit 7 on the Hwy 103.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: offering a 84 site campground, walking trails, picnic area, swimming area, playground and boat launch. The campground has water outlets and a trailer dump station.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
